testcase.classname: Select Product and check out in Amazon
testcase.name: User Select Product from Amazon and Check out the Product
testcase.system-out: Given Visit amazon.in.......................................................passed When Click ALL categories in the left side..................................passed And Click Men's fashion category and click TShirts and Polos................passed And In the left side option, choose "2XL" size..............................passed And In the left side option, mark eligible for Pay on delivery..............passed And From the results, scroll down and select AMERICAN CREW product and navigate to Product page.passed And Select Royal Blue & Navy Melange color..................................passed And Open and see size chart link present in product page then close it......passed And After that, select any size from size dropdown in product page..........passed And Add that product to cart and verify whether it is reflected in cart or not with correct details.passed Then Print the verification message in console for cart validation is success or not.passed
